response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $950,000 for this remarkable item. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value we receive for such a high-quality asset. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially welcoming you as a valued owner of this product.", "product_price": 950000}
